DOC.brief_summary: This study continue develop refine best practice delivery vocational service veteran history felony conviction mental health/substance abuse difficulty . There currently 225,000 incarcerated veteran estimate 64,000 veteran release prison annually . These veteran encounter significant difficulty find employment due stigma , intrapersonal difficulty , out-dated work skill . Additionally veterans likely homeless population. , Previous work find manual base , vocational group lead trained vocational staff lead quicker employment compare traditional vocational service manual base self study . To attempt improve previous result , study add principle component support employment include ongoing follow-up , treatment team coordination , community base assistance .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Supported Employment With Veterans With Felony Convictions Mental Illness Substance Abuse
DOC.criteria: history least one felony conviction diagnosis mental illness include substance use disorder dementia active psychosis
